philosophy.text: "We believe true luxury lies in simplicity, quality materials, and ethical craftsmanship."

origins.title: Peruvian Origins
origins.text: Sourced from the Andes, our alpaca and cotton fibers are world-renowned for their softness and durability.

design.title: Timeless Design
design.text: Pieces designed to transcend trends. Wardrobe staples that you will wear for years to come.

sustainable.title: Sustainable
sustainable.text: Committed to ethical production practices and minimizing our environmental footprint.

footer.description: Minimalist luxury menswear designed in Lima. Crafted with the finest Peruvian materials for the modern gentleman.
footer.subscribeText: Subscribe to receive updates, access to exclusive deals, and more.

about.title: Our Story
about.subtitle: Since 2026
about.heading: Minimal Luxury from Peru
about.description: Matteo Salvatore was born from a desire to redefine menswear through the lens of effortless elegance. We believe that true luxury lies in simplicity, quality materials, and impeccable fit.

craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.text: All our garments are crafted in small batches in Lima, Peru, using the finest Pima cotton and alpaca blends. We work directly with local artisans to ensure every stitch meets our exacting standards.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.text: We are committed to slow fashion. Our timeless designs are meant to last for years, not seasons. By using natural, biodegradable fibers, we minimize our environmental footprint.
